premise_source_doc_sentence: James Lawrence `` Jim '' Brooks  (  born May 9 , 1940  )  is an Academy Award - , Emmy - and Peabody Award-winning American television and movie director , producer and screenwriter .

claim: Broadcast News was authored by James L. Brooks.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Growing up in North Bergen , New Jersey , Brooks endured a fractured family life and passed the time by reading and writing .

claim: Broadcast News was authored by James L. Brooks.

claim: Broadcast News was authored by James L. Brooks.

claim: Broadcast News was authored by James L. Brooks.

claim: Broadcast News was authored by James L. Brooks.
premise_source_doc_sentence: The show , one of the first to feature an independent working woman as its lead character , was critically acclaimed and won Brooks several Primetime Emmy Awards .

claim: Broadcast News was authored by James L. Brooks.
